Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: A security deposit of GBP 300 is required on arrival via credit card. The deposit is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation. This property doesn’t accept cash for payment. This building has no reception. Please contact the property with your arrival time at the apartment so a representative can meet and welcome you personally upon arrival. The apartments are non-smoking and a fines are applied to guests breaking this rule. This property has a strict no party, no gathering policy. If there is evidence of a party or gathering, security and/or the police will be called and the apartment will need to be vacated and a penalty of GBP 2000 will be charged. Late arrivals: Check-in after 23:00 have a surplus charge of GBP 50. There is a standard waiting time of up to 2 hours once the property have received your arrival time, if you don’t arrive after 2 hours of your schedule time there will be a surplus charge of GBP 100, regardless of
